example.code:
PS C:\> New-EC2Address -Domain Vpc
AllocationId Domain PublicIp ------------ ------ -------- eipalloc-12345678 vpc 198.51.100.2
example.description: This example allocates an Elastic IP address to use with an instance in a VPC.

example.code:
PS C:\> New-EC2Address
AllocationId Domain PublicIp ------------ ------ -------- standard 203.0.113.17
example.description: This example allocates an Elastic IP address to use with an instance in EC2-Classic.
